alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Goshen and northeastern Laramie Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 400 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Meriden Rest Area, or 35 miles south of Torrington, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albin and Meriden Rest Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County
